it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapon.expression

Class PickEffect

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapon.expression.Expression
      • it.polimi.se2019.controller.weapon.expression.PickEffect

  • public class PickEffect
extends Expression
    Expression that evaluates to an effect picked by the user. The effect is picked through interactions wit the shooter's view.
    Author:
    Stefano Montesi

        Manage payment of a particular sum of ammo for executing a particular set of effects
        Parameters:
        context - context of the shoot interaction
        effectsToSelect - effects still left to select by the player
        effectsToPay - effects that the player has currently selected to pay
